name: refactor-me
description: Another poorly rewritten products API in node.js

scripts.start:dev: NODE_ENV=development npm run knex:reset:dev && NODE_ENV=development npx ts-node ./src/index.ts
scripts.start:docker:dev: NODE_ENV=development npm run docker:build:dev && npm run docker:up:dev
scripts.knex:reset:dev: NODE_ENV=development npm run knex:rollback:dev && npm run knex:migrate:dev && npx knex --knexfile ./database/knexfile.ts seed:run
scripts.docker:dev: npm run docker:build:dev && npm run docker:up:dev
